newsitem.title: CHILE: Codelco board meets Monday to decide new CEO.
newsitem.headline: Codelco board meets Monday to decide new CEO.

text.p: The board of Chile state copper company Codelco will meet Monday to decide who will replace CEO Juan Villarzu who last week was appointed as President Eduardo Frei's top adviser, said a Codelco spokeswoman.
The meeting will be held at 1600 local/2100 GMT.

Frontrunners for the post include vice president of administration and finance Marcos Lima and Nelson Pizarro, general manager of Codelco's largest division Chuquicamata, according to presidential sources.
Frei swore in Villarzu this weekend as his new chief of staff to replace Genero Arriagada.
